string-array.name: tables
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS location ( locationId TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, parent TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, locationType TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (locationId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS locationType ( typeName TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, typeId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (typeId))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS centre ( centreId TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE COLLATE NOCASE, name TEXT NOT NULL COLLATE NOCASE, PRIMARY KEY (centreId))
